tagline: The unofficial map editor for Westwood Online's Nox game
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Requirements
* Visual Studio 2012 Professional or higher

### Building
1. Clone or download the repo
2. Open the solution file (.sln) with Visual Studio
3. Click Build -> Solution

If the build fails, please create an issue on the main Github page. This will ensure that we are notified of the bug and can work on a fix.

### Support
The main line of help and support is available on the Nox [forums](http://www.noxforum.net/). There you will find the most relevant English speaking Nox community.
name: Nox Map Editor
